description:
Sanzo stays behind at the inn, while Hakkai, Gojyo, and Goku go out to get supplies. While they`re out, the three are confronted, as is Sanzo back at the inn, by exact copies of themselves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou no Teki: Lethal Weapon
~Lethal Weapon~ Les plus redoutables ennemis de l`Histoire
ศัตรูที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด
